summary: REQ-1 and REQ-2 appear to be implemented via switching resident/admin React Query hooks to a resilient actor pattern (timeouts + improved error handling) and updating Dashboard/ResidentProfile UI to show proper loading/error/retry states instead of empty content. REQ-3 is not implemented in the provided diff summary (no backend changes / no healthCheck method added). The diff also includes multiple unrelated UI/styling and dialog/form changes not requested by the BuildRequest.

missing_requirements.requirement: Backend must expose a public, non-authenticated health check method compatible with frontend startup diagnostics (performHealthCheck calls healthCheck()), e.g., `public query func healthCheck()` returning at least a message and timestamp.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff summary shows only frontend file modifications; there is no evidence of any backend (`backend/main.mo`) change adding or updating a `healthCheck()` method.
evidence: File diff summary: Added: 0, Modified: 5 (all listed are frontend-related or metadata); no `backend/main.mo` changes shown
frontend-file-summaries.txt (lists only frontend files; no backend changes referenced)
